project_descr: The Saravan Governance, Public Administration Reform and Decentralization Service Delivery Project (GPAR-SP) aims to improve the delivery of public goods and services in Saravan Province.

outputs.output_descr: 1. Planning&budgeting of local service delivery 2. Procedures for sustainable delivery 3. Financing/financial management 4. Rationalizing administrative organizations 5. Improving HRM practices 6. Policies informed by Saravan lessons 7. Project Support
